data.title: List of books by author Ian Stewart
data.meta_description: Get your Ian Stewart books today! Pango Books has a huge selection of new and used titles to choose from. See all books including: Judgment Day, Do Dice Play God?, Professor Stewart's Cabinet of Mathematical Curiosities, The Science of Discworld, The Collapse of Chaos, Flatterland, Visions of Infinity, Letters to a Young Mathematician, The Annotated Flatland, Why Beauty Is Truth, The Big Book of Brain Games, Nature's Numbers, Wheelers, The Mathematics of Life, Darwin's Watch, What Shape Is a Snowflake?, In Pursuit of the Unknown, Heaven, Calculating the Cosmos, What Is Mathematics?
